TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StandardToolWindows extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Defines GUID identifiers that correspond to the standard set of tool windows that are available in the design environment.

remarks.format:
## Remarks These GUIDs can be used to access the standard tool windows that are available to the design-time environment.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use StandardToolWindows to display a standard tool window. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService> interface.
[!code-vb[IUIServiceExample#5](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.componentmodel._147_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[IUIServiceExample#5](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.componentmodel._147_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[IUIServiceExample#5](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.componentmodel._147_1.cs)]

Docs.permission: for full access to system resources. Demand values: , . Associated state:

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid ObjectBrowser

Docs.summary: Gets the GUID for the object browser. This field is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid OutputWindow

Docs.summary: Gets the GUID for the output window. This field is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid ProjectExplorer

Docs.summary: Gets the GUID for the solution explorer. This field is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid PropertyBrowser

Docs.summary: Gets the GUID for the Properties window. This field is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid RelatedLinks

Docs.summary: Gets the GUID for the related links frame. This field is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid ServerExplorer

Docs.summary: Gets the GUID for the server explorer. This field is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly valuetype System.Guid TaskList

Docs.summary: Gets the GUID for the task list. This field is read-only.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.StandardToolWindows> to display a standard tool window. This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IUIService> interface.
